Garden Edging Rosebud

We are the local landscape edging experts for Rosebud. Create timeless, rusty garden borders that withstand the Rosebud coastal salt air.

Get a Rosebud Quote

Why Rosebud Gardens Need Corten

Owning property in Rosebud means dealing with sandy soils and salt exposure. Timber rots and plastic cracks. Corten steel is the only edging material that improves with age in our coastal climate.

We realize many Rosebud properties feature native coastal plantings. The rustic orange of Corten steel provides the perfect backdrop for these green-grey palettes.

  • Delivered to Rosebud Weekly
  • Installation Network in Rosebud area
  • Suitable for Rosebud Soil Conditions
